comment._content: Well, the negative says Central Park, and it looks like Central Park, so why the two question marks? That looks like the Dakota in the background, so probably around 72d Street and Central Park West. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Dakota. Here, I think: maps.google.com/maps?q=72d+street+and+central+park+west,+...

comment._content: artolog looks like you might be right.  The Dakota does look like the building in the picture, and the caption does say Central Park.  We will update the source data.
